agentAbility.name: Contracts
agentAbility.description: Kent targets enemies and locks on them for 4s; then, the targeting becomes stationary and a ballistic strike is called on the designated spot. In 1.5s, another strike is locked onto the Contracted target and prepared, for a total of 3 strikes. Targeted enemies are Identified for all allies.

primaryAttack.name: Autoloader
primaryAttack.description: Fires continuously until the magazine reserve is depleted

tankAbilities.name: Fastdraw Magazines
tankAbilities.description: Load specialist munitions from the secondary magazine when a situation gets tough. These munitions are loaded independently of the primary magazine.

tankAbilities.name: Recon Probe
tankAbilities.description: Launches up to 3 probes to detect enemies within a set radius and mark them as identified for al allies.
